_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five higher fetters [sn45.180:6.6]: Desire for rebirth in the realm of luminous form
Desire for rebirth in the formless realm
The qualities of the noble eightfold pat: Rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation
Culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion
Finish and end in the deathless
Have extinguishment as their culmination, destination, and end.
